summary.siteURLNotSet: You have not set the site URL yet, do you want to set it to the current {{current}} ?
summary.siteURLNotMatch: The site URL you set does not match the current one, do you want to set it to the {{current}} ?
summary.siteURLDescription: This setting is very important, make sure it matches the actual URL of your site. You can change this setting in Settings - Basic.

settings.subTitle: Subtitle
settings.siteDescriptionDes: Description of the website, which may be displayed in the shared page summary.
settings.siteURLDes: Very important, please make sure it is consistent with the actual situation. When using cloud storage policy and payment platform, please fill in the address that can be accessed by WAN.
settings.customFooterHTMLDes: Custom HTML code inserted at the bottom of the page.
settings.smallIconDes: URL of the small icon with the ico as extension
settings.mediumIconDes: URL of the medium icon, prefer size at 192x192, png format.
settings.largeIconDes: URL of the medium icon, prefer size at 512x512, png format.
settings.displayModeDes: The display mode of a PWA application after it's installed.
settings.themeColorDes: CSS color value that affect the color of the status bar on the PWA launch screen, the status bar in the content page, and the address bar.
settings.webauthnNoHttps: Web Authn requires your website to be HTTPS enabled, and please confirm that in Settings - Basic - Site URL also uses HTTPS.
settings.allowNewRegistrationsDes: After disabled, no new users can be registered, unless manually added by admins.
settings.emailActivationDes: After enabled, new users need to click the activation link in the email to complete signups. Please make sure the email delivery settings are correct, otherwise the activation email will not be delivered.
settings.captchaForSignupDes: Whether to enable the captcha for signups.
settings.captchaForLoginDes: Whether to enable the captcha for logins.
settings.captchaForResetDes: Whether to enable the captcha for resetting password.
settings.webauthnDes: Whether to allow users to log in using a hardware authenticator, the website must enable HTTPS for this to work.
settings.defaultGroupDes: The initial user group after user registration.
settings.testSMTPTooltip: Before sending a test email, please save the changed SMTP settings; the email delivery results will not be fed back immediately, if you do not receive a test email for a long time, please check the error log output by Cloudreve in the terminal.
settings.senderNameDes: The sender's name displayed in the email.
settings.smtpServerDes: SMTP server address, without port number.
settings.smtpUsernameDes: SMTP username, generally the same as the sender address.
settings.replyToAddressDes: The mailbox used to receive reply emails when users reply to emails sent by the system.
settings.enforceSSLDes: Whether to enforce an SSL encrypted connection. If you cannot send emails, you can turn this off and Cloudreve will try to use STARTTLS and decide whether to use encrypted connections.
settings.smtpTTLDes: SMTP connections established during the TTL period will be reused by new mail delivery requests.
settings.activateNewUserDes: Template for activation email after new user registration.
settings.workerNumDes: The maximum number of tasks to be executed in parallel by the master node task queue, restarting Cloudreve is needed to take effect.
settings.transitParallelNumDes: Maximum number of parallel co-processes for transfer tasks.
settings.tempFolderDes: Used to store temporary files generated by tasks such as decompression, compression, etc.
settings.textEditMaxSize: Max size of editable text files
settings.textEditMaxSizeDes: The maximum size of a text file that can be edited online, files beyond this size cannot be edited online.
settings.failedChunkRetryDes: Maximum number of retries after a failed chunk, only for server-side uploads or transferring.
settings.cacheChunksDes:
If enabled, streaming chunk uploads will cache chunk data in a temporary directory for retrying after failed uploads.
 If disabled, streaming chunk uploads do not take up additional hard disk space, but the entire upload will fail immediately after a single chunk failure.
settings.resetConnectionDes: If enabled, the server will force to reset the connection if upload verification fails.
settings.uploadSessionDes: For supported storage policy, user can resume uploads within upload session expiration. Max value various from third-party storage providers.
settings.downloadSessionForSharedDes: Repeated downloads of shared files within this set period of time will not be counted in the total number of downloads.
settings.onedriveMonitorIntervalDes: At set intervals, Cloudreve will request OneDrive to check client uploads to ensure they're under control.
settings.onedriveCallbackToleranceDes: Maximum time to wait for the callback after the OneDrive client has finished uploading, if it exceeds it, the upload will be considered failed.
settings.onedriveDownloadURLCacheDes: Cloudreve can cache the result after getting the file download URL to reduce the frequency of hot API requests.
settings.slaveAPIExpirationDes: Timeout time for master to wait for slave API request responses.
settings.heartbeatIntervalDes: The interval at which the master node sends heartbeats to slave nodes.
settings.heartbeatFailThresholdDes: The maximum number of retries the master can make after sending a heartbeat to a slave that fails. After all failed retries, the node will enter recovery mode.
settings.heartbeatRecoverModeIntervalDes: Interval between master attempts to reconnect to a node after the node has been marked as recovery mode.
settings.slaveTransitExpirationDes: Maximum time that can be consumed by a slave to execute a file transfer task.
settings.keepAtLeastOneTheme: Please reserve at least one theme.
settings.themeConfigDes: Full available configurations can be referred at <0>Default Theme - Material-UI</0>.
settings.defaultThemeDes: The default them to use when the user does not specify a preferred one.
settings.personalFileListView: Default view for personal file list
settings.personalFileListViewDes: The default display view to use when the user does not specify a preferred one.
settings.sharedFileListView: Default view for shared file list
settings.sharedFileListViewDes: The default display view to use when the user does not specify a preferred one.
settings.avatarFilePathDes: Path to save user's avatar files.
settings.avatarSizeDes: Maximum size of avatar files that users can upload.
settings.officePreviewServiceDes: You can use following magic variables：
settings.localOnlyInfo: The following settings only apply to local storage policies.
settings.thumbQualityDes: Compression quality percentage, valid only for jpg encoding.
settings.captchaElement: Elements inside of the captcha image.
settings.siteKeyDes: You can find it at <0>App Management Page</0>.
settings.siteSecretDes: You can find it at <0>App Management Page</0>.
settings.secretIDDes: You can find it at <0>Access Management Page</0>.
settings.secretKeyDes: You can find it at <0>Access Management Page</0>.
settings.tCaptchaAppIDDes: You can find it at <0>Captcha Management Page</0>.
settings.tCaptchaSecretKeyDes: You can find it at <0>Captcha Management Page</0>.
